DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether Forlax® is more effective than placebo in relieving chronic constipation in children who may also suffer from soiling or faecal incontinence.
DOC.brief_title: To Determine the Effect of Forlax® Treatment in Children With Chronic Constipation Who May Also Suffer From Soiling/ Faecal Incontinence.
DOC.criteria: Chronic constipation (defined as at least 3 months of less than 2 bowel movements (BMs) per week and/or one of the following symptoms : hard stool, painful defecation, encopresis) Constipation previously treated by dietary advice (high fiber diet) for at least two weeks without efficacy Organic bowel diseases Suspected GI obstruction History of GI surgery
